document.docAuthor: Belqat, Boutaïna, Adler, Peter H. & Crosskey, Roger W.
document.masterDocTitle: Faunistic and bibliographical inventory of the blackflies (Diptera: Simuliidae) of Morocco

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Faunistic and bibliographical inventory of the blackflies (Diptera: Simuliidae) of Morocco

subSubSection.paragraph: Bailly-Choumara & Beaucournu-Saguez ( 1981 : 52–54 ): groupe monticola (« sp. nova A » and « sp. nova B »), records.

bibRefCitation.author: Giudicelli
bibRefCitation.refString: Giudicelli, J. & Bouzidi, A. (1989) Contribution a l'etude faunistique et ecologique des simulies (Diptera, Simuliidae) du Maroc. III. Deux especes nouvelles du Haut Atlas: Simulium (Simulium) atlasicum n. sp. et Simulium (Simulium) berberum n. sp. Annales de Limnologie, 25, 145 - 158.

subSubSection.paragraph:
High Atlas:
Giudicelli & Bouzidi ( 1989 : 146–151 )
: original description (male, female, pupa, larva, figures).
Clergue-Gazeau et al . ( 1991
: 53–54 ): listed.
Giudicelli et al . ( 2000
: 62, 70 ): records.
Belqat et al . ( 2001 a
: 12 ): listed.
Belqat ( 2002 : 222–225 )
: record, distribution map, figures (copies of drawings from
Giudicelli & Bouzidi ( 1989 ))
.
Belqat & Dakki ( 2004 : 93–109, 112 – 137 )
: record, dichotomous key, figures (copies of original drawings).

Belqat et al . ( 2005

group by P.H. Adler; identity to be determined).

: 54–55 ): analysis of correspondence factors to determine ecological affinities and relations between 28 Rif species and 85 stations.
